**Navigating the Terrain of Spatial Planning**

Welcome to **Spatial Insights**, your go-to hub for all things spatial planning in Kenya. Whether you're an physical and land use planner, a curious citizen, or an enthusiast eager to explore land use dynamics, this platform has you covered.

Why **Spatial Insights**? Because we dive deep into Kenya's spatial planning, offering insightful analysis and up-to-date coverage on urban sprawl, rural development, infrastructure, and conservation.
